Label: Prize or award jury
Description: Free text listing members of the jury that awarded the prize. Optional, and repeatable if the text is provided in more than one language. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <PrizeJury>, but must be included in each instance if <PrizeJury> is repeated.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 500 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
Example: <g343>Russell Banks, Victoria Glendinning and Alistair MacLeod</g343>
